Packages that use ScopeConfiguration
Package
Description
oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.di
A javax.inject compatible Dependency Injection (D.I.) framework.

  • Uses of ScopeConfiguration in oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.di

    Method
    Description
    ScopeConfiguration

    ScopeConfiguration
    ScopeConfiguration.ignore(Class<?> type)
    Ensure that all providers of the specified service type are ignored in this scope.
    default ScopeConfiguration
    ScopeConfiguration.named(Map<String,Object> namedAttributes)
    Add the specified object instances, each of which will be constrained with a Named constraint.
    ScopeConfiguration
    ScopeConfiguration.onClose(Runnable onClose)
    Configure a task to be run when this scope is closed.
    default ScopeConfiguration
